title: Automated Security Detection and Analysis System
text: This project is based on computer system logs and alarm information to conduct trace analysis of received attacks. Given the log files and alarm events as input, it can automatically generate attack chain diagrams and attack entry point information for further analysis by security personnel.

title: Cobalt Strike external C2 in Rust
text:
An implementation of Cobalt Strike external C2's cilent in Rust, which can avoid killing of firewalls (Windows Defender、Horong Security、360 Defender etc.)
Find more here: https://github.com/jinyaoguo/CS-Exteral-C2inRust

title: Automatic Translation System for Low-Resource Languages
text:
Implemented a lightweight translation system that maintains translation accuracy even under limited training data.
Proposed a new method for corpus construction and filtering and applied for a patent.

title: Robustness Study of Image Recognition Models
text:
Conducted black-box testing to assess the robustness of the Residual Neural Network (ResNet) to Gaussian noise and adversarial samples.
Implemented ResNet using PyTorch and introduced a small amount of Gaussian noise into the forward propagation during training to enhance model's robustness.
